text: Rantasalmi is a municipality in Southern Savonia, Finland. As of January 2014, almost 3,900 people lived there. Neighbouring municipalities are Joroinen, Juva, Savonlinna, Sulkava and Varkaus. Rantasalmi was established in 1578. ==Known people== *Eliel Saarinen, architect *Jarkko Immonen, ice hockey player *Maria HÃ¤nninen, musician *Jussi Leskinen, a person who died at the age 108. He was the oldest person in Finland on 28 February 2010. == Other websites == * The official Rantasalmi page Category:Municipalities of South Savo Category:1578 establishments Category:16th-century establishments in Finland Category:1570s establishments in Europe
